properties.name: private_key_username
properties.description: Private key username found under the registered APPs section of your NETELLER Merchant Account.

properties.name: private_key_password
properties.description: Private key password found under the registered APPs section of your NETELLER Merchant Account.

properties.name: returnurl
properties.description: The URL endpoint to redirect the customer back to after a redirection to neteller payment.

properties.name: iframelocation
properties.description: The cashier html document element name where the iframe should open. (_blank or cashier_iframe_content usually)

properties.name: simulator
properties.description: Leave blank to use neteller's transaction simulator page, or set to EXTERNAL to use the payment gateway
